pullrequest.title: Changes required for ing-gazebo for gpu ray

content.raw:
Changing `gpu_ray` to `gpu_lidar` in SDF would be okay, but there is a lot of legacy file that still use `gpu_ray.

I've created two pull requests which I think allow us to use the `gpu_lidar` name for the plugin while supporting `gpu_ray` in sdf.

1. #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/134/use-the-lidar-name-instead-of-ray/diff
2. #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/30/use-lidar/diff
content.html:
Changing gpu_ray to gpu_lidar in SDF would be okay, but there is a lot of legacy file that still use `gpu_ray.

I've created two pull requests which I think allow us to use the gpu_lidar name for the plugin while supporting gpu_ray in sdf.

  1. #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/134/use-the-lidar-name-instead-of-ray/diff
  2. #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/30/use-lidar/diff
